r1: Must be between 8 and 32 characters in length
r2: Must have at least one LOWERCASE character (a-z)
r3: Must have at least one UPPERCASE character (A-Z)
r4: Must have at least one number (0-9)
r5: Must have at least one special character (!”+,-/;:[]\~@#$%^&*()^{}’)
r6: Must not contain more than 4 consecutive number
r7: Must not contain more than 4 identical number
r8: The two password entries are inconsistent
